eventSummary:
A report from CertiK indicates that total losses from hacks, exploits, and scams in the cryptocurrency sector exceeded $3.35 billion this year.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28232092/ALERT-Losses-from-hacks-exploits-and-scams-topped-335B-this-year-per-CertiK

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Gnosis executed a hard fork to recover funds following a November exploit of Balancer that resulted in $116M in stolen digital assets.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28227241/LATEST-Gnosis-executed-a-hard-fork-on-Monday-to-recover-funds-from-a-November-Balancer-exploit-that-saw-116M-in-digital-assets-stolen-with-the-funds-now-out-of-the-hackers-control

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The University of Phoenix confirmed a data breach affecting 3.5 million individuals, stemming from a zero-day vulnerability exploit in Oracle EBS enterprise software attributed to threat groups Cl0p or FIN11.
Sources:
- https://www.reddit.com/r/cybersecurity/comments/1pude2k/35_million_affected_by_university_of_phoenix_data

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Lynx hacking group claimed to have breached OMNIBUS JAPAN INC., a Japanese news and multimedia company. The incident is currently pending verification.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mapuwmusa62q
